Title: Know Thy Enemy
Plot: Tomas Vergis confronts Daniel over the theft of the meta-cognitive processor and the two workers who were murdered in the robbery. However, his means of revenge aren't quite what Daniel expects.
Writer: Patrick Massett, John Zinman, Matthew B. Roberts
GuestStars: Scott Porter, Patton Oswalt, John Pyper-Ferguson, Alex Arsenault, James Marsters
